choices: "Hi!" (Childish)
"You look tasty." (Somewhat childish)
"Hmpf." (Neutral)
"Out of my way." (Moody)
Evil Cackle (....Evil, Duh!)
1.content:
You sigh as you walk home from school, looking down at the street below your feet. Yet another day has gone by, and being the freshman hasn't gotten any better. High school wasn't the glamorous place you though it was back when you were in junior high; Even more so because the guys that picked on you back then were back to picking on you here. You're an anime fan. How can you help it?

The worst disappointment of the year has to be that your fantasy of true love hasn't come true yet. No girl even seems to look in your direction. You shake your head and continue walking to your house.

As soon as you enter the house, your little sister, Hannah, comes running and hugs your leg. "Hey, big brother!" You chuckle and rub her head. Hannah could make you smile no matter what had happened.

You head up to your room and fall onto your bed, tired from the day’s events. You drift off into sleep, thankful that you have a few moments of peace.......

You wake up slowly, and you look out the window. The sun was just beginning to set. You hear your mother calling for you. "I need you to go to the store real quick."

You shrug and go downstairs, getting the money from your mom and heading out the door.

On your way, you go through the park, which had the shortest way to the store. And that's when you saw her.......

You froze in your tracks as she stood there, looking at you. She had bubblegum pink skin and holes throughout the body. She was about your height, surprisingly. Her clothes seemed a bit baggy, but still showed off some of her curves, including her long boots. Her eyes were red, and her skin seemed to morph on her head to look like hair. And on the top of her head extended a short antenna. She had a stern expression on her face, staring you down.

You make the motion to step back, but she steps forward at a much faster pace, coming towards you. Something had kept you from running; something in your mind just wouldn't act upon the fear. She stepped closer and got within arms reach, and then she spoke.....
1.title: Encouter of the Pink Kind

choices: Take her home.
Let her stay in the park.
Try and find another place.
Get someone to help you.
Leave her.
11.content:
"Hi!" The being had a voice that sounded a little childish, but still mature. Like a teenager. You blink as you stand there, wondering what was going on.

"Uh.....hi?" Was all you managed to say back.

She smiled. "You must be one of the Earthlings I've heard about." She looked around as if to examine your body. "You seem a lot less hairy than I was told."

"Wh-what? Earthling? You mean....you're an alien?"

"Well, to you I am. I'm a Majin, created by a sorcerer. My name is Lamp."

All of this seemed way to strange and weird to you. An alien called a Majin? You've seen that from one of your favorite animes, Dragonball Z, with Majin Buu. This girl did look a lot like him.....but that was an anime show! It wasn't real......was it?

"Hey...uh...you're a Majin? As in, like, Buu?"

She nods.

"So...aren't you....here to destroy?"

This time, she frowned. "Hmf. Great. Another stereotype planet. Just because Buu was a rampager doesn't mean I am."

"Oh....I'm sorry. I didn’t mean to offend you. You....seem rather nice.

At that, she smiled again. "Thanks. But please don't get the wrong idea."

As if by some unknown force, you reach out and poke her pink skin. It felt similar to normal skin, but it was softer. Lamp noticed this and giggled. "Is that some way of greeting each other? Ok!" And with that she poked you back...forcefully. You were pushed back so hard you fell to the ground, all from a simple poke. You are sprawled on the ground and you see Lamp looking over you. "You ok?"

You slowly pick yourself up and stretch a bit. "Yeah...I'm ok. But let's just say humans aren't as strong as your race....remember that."

She nodded slowly. "You are the first human I've seen. What's your name?"

"Oh, I'm Michael."

"Nice to meet your race, Michael. Hey....mind if I stay here for a bit?"

You gulp. A pink girl from an anime show just asked if you could stay on the planet.....was that really your choice?
11.title: Cheerful Little Alien

choices: Sister
Mother
Father
111.content:
"Well, I guess I could take you to my house." You rub the back of your head.

Her eyes wide. "You'd do that for me?"

You blush a bit. "Uh...yeah. I mean you might be powerful enough to tough it out, but that doesn't mean you have too-"

You were cut off as a pink wall enveloped your face, Lamp hugging you close. "Aw. Thank you!"

You tried to say 'You're welcome,' but the bear hug left you with barely any room to breath. You flail a bit, and she notices your waving arms and lets go. She giggled childishly. "Sorry."

You pant a bit but smile. "No....problem...let's go...I gotta stop by the store."

She nods and you lead her to the store. You tell her to wait outside, since the storekeeper might freak if she saw her. You pick up the items you needed and you two start walking again, or in Lamp's case, skipping. 'Why does she act like a kid?' You wonder in your head. 'She looks as old as I am.'

You two walk down the quiet street, and Lamp looks around the neighborhood. "Wow! So this is how Earthlings live."

You chuckle a bit. "Yeah. The ones that get the average amount of money, at least." You come up to your house. "This is where I live."

You open the door, and a family member is behind it.......
111.title: Taking home an Alien

choices: Take her home and sneak her into your room.
Take her home and ask your parents if she can stay
Have her stay in the park and bring her food later.
Have her stay but she won't let you leave her.
Before you can decide her pink body absorbs you.
12.content:
"You look tasty. Can I eat you?" Asked the cute pink Alien in a childish voice. Much like a kid asking if they can have a cookie.

"Eat me? Sorry no." You said trying not to sound scared of her.

"Please? I promise it won't hurt." She smiled trying to talk you into it.

"I really don't want to be your lunch miss Alien." You said still nervous but calming down.

"Alien? But I'm not an Alien you are." She said as she took a step closer to you.

"No I'm not. I'm a human. Your an Alien." You said trying not to get in an argument with the women who wanted to eat you.

"I'm a Majin, your an Alien. Also my name is Lamp. Nice to meet you Alien." She said with a smile.

"I'm Michael. Majin? You mean like Buu?" You asked her.

"Yeah! Just like him only way cuter right." She smiled as she put one arm behind her head and the other on her waist to show off her body.

"You are cute it's true but may I ask why you're on earth Lamp?" You asked the pink women.

"Earth? Is that where I am? Guess I took a wrong turn 40,000,000 light years back?" She said as she thought about her trip to earth.

"Well I'm sorry about you getting lost but you probably should be on your way." You said now trying to end the conversation with the Majin before you.

"Sorry I can't. My ship was made for a one way trip and to make things worse It broke when it crashed. It wasn't made to be on earth so of course it broke. Oh well. Mind if you show me around Earth Michael?" She asked giving you a cute look as if trying to make you do it.

You didn't really know what to do? A Majin just showed up in the park with no way off earth You don't really know what to do with her. You could take her home but what would your parents think? And what about your little sister? Maybe you could leave her in the park but would it be OK to just leave her? You had to do something with those cute eyes looking at you. What's a poor earthling to do?.....
12.title: You new hungry Alien cutie?

choices: Lamp turns into a mini figure
Lamp turns into a ball
Lamp couldn't change time to go to plan B
121.content:
You look at Lamp and take her hand and start walking as the makes her tilt her head.

"What are you doing?" Lamp asked with her head tilted to the side, she looks at her hand and see it attached to yours at first she thought of something but didn't want to startle you. "Where are we going?" She asked trying to get you to stop walking.

You didn't stop but you somewhat smiled hearing her cute voice. "I'm taking you to my house, I'm going to sneak you in so my parents don't notice a pink blob with me." You said trying not to sound mean to the Majin.

Lamp frowned a little and puffed up her cheeks. "I'm not fat if you're saying that, I'm very well feed and thin." She noticed the different areas on Earth aside from the park but smiled seeing all the food places there were.

You then got home and noticed that your parents were home, you had to think of some way to get into your room with Lamp. You then looked at her. "Can you like shape shift into something?"

Lamp looked at you but thinks for a moment. "I could try but if it helps you get me inside with you then it'll be a good way to sneak around." She then lets go of your hand and concentrates on a object to turn into.

You watch Lamp wondering what she would turn into, there was multiple things she could turn into but you wondered what she would pick.
121.title: Take her home and sneak her into your room.

choices: You arrive at her ship.
You go into a cave.
You find a clearing.
124.content:
"I think it would be best if you stayed here for tonight." You are a bit nervous. If your family sees you brining home an alien, you doubt they will not raise alarms.

"Aww. Come on. I wanna see this planet." She pouts cutely, and you blush.

"Well, I don't think people will take your sudden appearance very well." You try and reason with her. "We don't really get many visitors from space, and most people may think of the worst."

She shakes her head. "Not if you are with me. You can tell them I mean no harm! Please?" She is basically begging like a little child.

"I'm only asking that you stay for tonight, Ms. Lamp. I can show you tomorrow." You sweat a bit. You don't know how someone like you could really convince people she is good. Even anime fans would have a hard time believing it. And you are trying to not make her mad: you know that she is strong enough to basically take out the entire planet if she wanted to.

She slowly nods. "Ok....but can I ask one thing in return?"

Before you can even respond, her pink arm stretches out and wraps around your chest. You are then pulled closer to the girl and she smiles innocently. "You are gonna stay with me. I want to stay close to you so you can protect me, ok?"

You gulp a bit. The tight arm around your chest was squeezing you a bit. "W-why would you need me? You're strong, right? I'm sure you can handle anything on Earth."

Her arm pulls you closer. "But I'm scared, Michael. Please stay with me."

She pouts more like a child. You wonder why she is so determined to keep you, but you let out a sigh. No way can you get out of her grip. And really, you kinda like the fact that a girl as cute as her is asking you to be with her, even if she is an alien. “Fine. I’ll stay with you.”

“Yaay!” She pulls you into a hug. “Thank you!”

“You’re…..welcome” The hug, you thought, was about to crack some bones.

She continues to hold you as she walks through the park, heading into the dense amount of trees. “We can stay in here for tonight, ok?” She continues to walk…….
124.title: In the Arms of a Majin

choices: She just wanted to get you alone. She's hungry and you look tasty!
She wanted a friend, she's never really had a close friend before.
She wants Micheal to be her boyfriend. She's very amorous!
1241.content:
"Um, stay where?" You say, looking into the small, empty clearing in the woods.

"Here of course silly." she says, mutters something unintelligible and a hole opens up before her. "What, did you think I'd leave my ship for anyone to see?"

You gaped as she walked into the door in thin air. OK, her ship must be invisible. Weird! Your thoughts on the matter are cut short as she turned back, seemingly impatient that you are just standing there, and stretches her arm out again, wraps it around your waist and hauls you off the ground, and draws you inside. The door shuts with a decided grinding noise and you think you see sparks above it. Lamp doesn't let go with her stretched arm though.

"Uh, Lamp," you say nodding towards the door, trying to take your mind of her warm skin wrapped around your waist, "that didn't sound good. Is it OK?"

"No. Like I said, the ship's broke." she said simply, though smiled while she said it, and calmly drew you along side her and rested her head against your shoulder as she walked down a corridor, your feet held an inch off the ground as she walked.

There really wasn't a lot you could do so you just tried to remain still, feeling very nervous. This girl was (if she really was a Meijin!) incredibly powerful and could kill you in an instant if she felt like it, and you knew practically nothing about her! So far though she'd been, well, affectionate at least. It seemed she wanted you for something
1241.title: You arrive at her ship.

choices: "Fine, you can eat me..." (safe and wholesome option)
"I'm still not gonna just LET you eat me!" (playing with fire, bud)
12411.content:
As soon as the door shuts behind you, Lamp's arms stretch and wrap around you tightly. She pulls you in for a warm hug and begins to nuzzle your chest.

"I'm, uh, not objecting to this", you start, "but why exactly are you cuddling me?"

"I wanna make sure you're nice and relaxed when I eat you, duh!", Lamp speaking as if it should be obvious, though her voiced being slightly muffled as she buries her face against your warm body. "So soft~..."

"Okay, that I'm objecting to! I already told you, I don't want to be eaten!"

"Aww, you only said that cuz you don't know what it's like~" Lamp says with a purr, letting her tongue roll out of her mouth and slowly drag up your cheek. "Mmmmm, I was right, you are yummy~!"

"Blech! What do you mean, 'what it's like'!? I know it means I'll end up melting in your gut!" you loudly protest.

"Now, where did I say that'd happen, huh?" she retorts. Lamp notices your visual confusion, and elaborates. "I just said I'd eat you, I never mentioned any sort of digesting. I'm magic, remember? I can control all my bodily functions with ease, and I just love the feeling of a nice full tummy! But, if you still wanna struggle after being told you'll be safe, I can't make any promises, got it?"

"Well, uh..."
12411.title: She's hungry, and you look yummy!

choices: Oral
Other
124111.content:
"...Fine, I'll let you eat me." you tell her, a mix of relief that you'll be safe and the fear that you'll be swallowed whole. Lamp, on the other hand, was overjoyed.

"THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!" Lamp yelled as she held you even tighter, pressing her (admittedly soft and warm) cheek against yours. "I promise, I'll be super gentle and make sure you're all safe and warm and cozy inside me and I'll rub my belly with you in it an-"

"Lamp, I get it, breathe!" you interrupt, noticing her exhausting herself.

"Right, pant right, pant thanks..." Lamp takes a deep breath to calm herself. "Hey, since you were nice enough to let me eat you, I'll let you decide how I do it!"
124111.title: "Fine, you can eat me..." (safe and wholesome :3)

choices: Head first
Feet first
1241111.content:
"Can I, uh, just go in your mouth like normal..?"

"Of course!" Lamp says with glee, a wide grin and a deep blush on her face. Her arms unwrap themselves, and, with a bit of flair, she removes your shoes, socks, pants, and shirt in one slick movement, leaving only your undergarments. "I just have to taste as much of you as possible! Sorry if you're feeling chilly, you'll be nice and warm soon!" Lamp's arms wrap around you again, but this time, more gently. She carries you over to her large, plushy bed, and sits you down, kneeling in front of you.

"So, um, what now?" You squirm a bit in your seat, clearly nervous. She stands up, kisses your cheek, and looks deep into your eyes.

"Do you want me to start from your head or your feet?"
1241111.title: Down Her Gullet!

choices: "Sure!" (Even more cute and wholesome vore)
"Sorry, but, I don't think so." (Lamp will now try to make you fall for her)
12411112.content:
"Can you start with my feet?" you tell Lamp, your bare toes scrunching a bit out of shyness. "I'm a bit nervous about going head-first into the dark."

"Aww~" Lamp seems to find your fear adorable. "Of course!" Lamp kneels in front of your feet and licks her lips, eyes looking hungry. Her tongue greedily slurps over your toes, pulling them into her warm, wet mouth as she sucks on them, pulling both feet fully into her mouth. You wriggle your toes, squishing her tongue beneath them, as she happily lapped at your soles. It sounds like Lamp is saying something like, "Mmm, sweet like candy~", but her voice is a bit muffled behind your feet. She takes her first swallow of you, and your toes enter her throat, heels resting on her tongue, as Lamp begins licking your ankles.

"I'll be okay, I'll be okay" you repeat to yourself, hoping Lamp keeps her promise to keep you safe. Another swallow, she has you in up to the halfway point of your calves. Her throat tightly contracts and expands around your feet, massaging them and helping to relax you, as you're, y'know, literally being eaten alive. Another gulp. The warmth is setting in as her lips pass over your knees. Another gulp, and your thighs fill her hungry maw. Lamp continues moaning, your flavor seems to be incredible to her. Gulp. She playfully teases your private area with a lick and looks you in the eye to flash a wink. Gulp. Her eyes stay focused on yours, deep and loving, telling you that, despite hunger being a factor, she truly wants to comfort you. Gulp. You feel your feet enter her stomach, as she now tickles your tummy with some laps, and the warmth now, ironically, sends chills up your spine. Gulp. Your stomach enters her mouth, and she motions for you to help her by tucking your arms into her gullet. You oblige, and she licks your hands and arms. Gulp. Her lips curve over your chest, the slick muscle of her tongue now wrapping around you and pressing firmly in different spots, massaging you. Gulp. Her lips have now sealed themselves over your neck.

Lamp takes a few moments to suck on you as if you were a large piece of candy, which, with however her taste buds work, you might as well have been. Before she takes the next swallow, she stares into your eyes again and (attempts to) comfort you with a warm smile. It's hard to see, but you feel her lips curl into an innocent smile around you, and you understand her intent. Gulp. Your head is in her mouth. The only bit of you that remains outside her is your hair, which she quickly slurps in. It's time, her tongue gets to work snuggling against your face. It's slimy, but oh-so warm and soft. Her tongue is being very gentle and loving, lapping up your sweet taste while still being considerate not not get in your eyes or anything. It does, however, graze against your lips, poking in slightly, but nothing more than a tease. Gulp. You're now entirely within her, sliding down her throat as it gently caresses you. The pulsing massage is so relaxing and reassuring. You're safe inside her.

You spend several minutes being snuggled and massaged until you gently slide into her belly. From the slight glow of the walls, you can tell her innards are a cute, candy-like pink, just like the rest of her. As you curl up and nuzzle the cuddly stomach walls, Lamp tightly hugs you, and then starts kicking her feet and moaning loudly. "You taste SO GOOD!!! Oh my god you taste so good! I've never had anything as sweet as you in my entire life! All the candy in the universe couldn't compare to you!!!"

You reply, flustered, "A-aww, thank you. I, uh, never really considered how good I taste, but, I'm glad you like me."

"Like you? No, I LOVE you! Oh, man, would you be alright with me becoming your girlfriend? I've never felt this way about someone before, even among other people I've eaten!"

You adjust your body in her tummy to get comfy, which, honestly, wasn't very hard, you doubted anything in existence could even come close to being as cozy, and took a second to ponder her question. "M-my girlfriend? Well, uh..."
12411112.title: Oral Foot Massage (kinda?)

choices: Lamp wants to go on a date with you!
Lamp wants to meet your family!
124111121.content:
"You know what? Sure! I'll be your (boy/girl)friend!" You gleefully tell Lamp, the strangeness of the situation starting to bother you less and less. Though you hated to admit it, it really was nice inside her. You felt so warm and safe tucked away in Lamp's tummy, and she certainly noticed.

Her grip around her belly tightens, and her face smushes against it until she can nuzzle your cheek through her own stomach. "Yaaaaaaay! Thank you thank you thank you so MUCH! We're gonna have so much fun together, it'll be awesome!" Lamp calms down and lays back in her bed, clothes morphing into a graphic tee with a lolipop on it, slippers, and sweatpants, though she quickly kicks the slippers off. "So awesome..." She seems to have calmed down, but is still holding you nice and tightly.

"Goodnight, Lamp!" You say to her, but she doesn't respond. Rather, her stomach walls start moving around you more, until...

...Lamp climbs out of the wall into her own stomach???

"Woah, what the hell?! I didn't know you could eat yourself!" Lamp wraps her arms around your torso snuggly and nuzzles your face, wrapping her legs around yours.

"I can't do that!" Lamp giggles, "But I can transfer my consciousness into a copy of myself within my own body! While the body we're inside hugs us, I can snuggle you from in here!" Indeed, you noticed the grip of the Lamp that swallowed you wasn't letting up, it was still kind and firm. "What? Did you think I'd let my new (boy/girl)friend sleep all alone in my tummy~?" Unable to argue against her, you sigh and hug her back, just as warmly and lovingly. You felt so comfortable, being hugged by, essentially, three things at once. Lamp, her stomach, and her second body within her. "Good night, sweetie~..." Lamp takes one last lick of your cheek before you two fall asleep, safe in each other's arms. Come morning...
124111121.title: Love is in The Air- Er, Belly!

choices: Eats you all in one go
Takes her time your her dildo and snack.
1241112.content:
Lamp shrinks and takes you in her hand. She giggles and gives you a few licks before spreading her leg. She childishly chants.

"Big Pussy Eat You Up. Get Up in this Pussy. Yum Yum Yummy Yum Yum."
1241112.title: Other

choices: "Well, have sex obviously!" OK, she's VERY forward!
"Take me out and show me romantic spots on Earth!" She's very sentimental.
12413.content:
"Here we go." She said, stepping into a small chamber.

Inside it looks, well, like a bedroom, if with rounded walls. There doesn't seem to be a corner anywhere, edge of the floor, ceiling, or around the curving walls! There are two rounded little tables, one with several odd looking stools around it, and one huge bed, again round. It looks sumptuous! Bright red sheets, big puffy pillows and... a mirror on the ceiling above it!

"What do you think Micheal?" She said, letting his feet touch the ground, but not withdrawing her arm from around him.

"Uh, it's very nice. T... this is your room?" she nods, smiling at him. "Uh, oh. Well yeah, it's very nice." You add lamely, trying to think of something to say. "Um, very good taste."

"Oh you think so? Oh thank you!" she says and hugs you tight.

Your breath leaves you in an instant and you think you feel your ribs creaking! When she lets go her arm is gone from around your waist at least. She practically hops to the bed, obviously very happy, and sits down on the edge, patting the silky fabric next to her.

"Come on, sit down Micheal."

"Uh, OK." You say nervously, testing to see if anything was broken by that hug, but it seems she does know her strength. You seem OK, just!

Tentatively you walk over and sit down next to her. She promptly puts an arm around your shoulders and rests her head on the right one, sighing.

"Micheal... do you.... like me?"

Your mind whirls. Where is this going? You've been friends with girls before and got, well close, but never had a real girlfriend before. You've maybe been in this position a few times, but never with someone this... emphatic!

"Well, I don't know you very well, but... yeah, I like you Lamp. You seem like a nice... girl."

At this she seems to practically collapse against you, sighing hard.

"Oh you have no idea how rare that is! You see I came to Earth because you are so much nicer than Majin. You aren't as aggressive, you actually make friends with each other so easily. *Sigh!* Will, will you be my boyfriend Micheal?"

"Boyfriend? I... wait, I thought you said you took a wrong turn? You came here by accident?"

"Uh, well... OK, that was a little fib." she said giggling. "I thought you'd think I was a little creepy if I was coming here to find a guy. So... will you?"

Boyfriend! Whoah.

"Well, I... You do seem nice Lamp, but this is awfully sudden." She seems to lock up next to you, nervous it seems. "Oh, Sure. Sure I'll be your boyfriend Lamp."

"You will? YOU WILL?" she says, twisting you forcefully round to face her, grinning.

She stares into your eyes for a few moments, tears practically coming from them as she looks at you. Then you are taken in a huge hug again, and this time you join in. It's still breathtaking... literally, but you go with it and finally she lets up, sniffing as she grins back at you happily.

"Uh, yeah. I will Lamp. But could you go easy on the hugs? We humans are rather frail compared to Majin!"

"Oh, did I hurt you? I thought I was holding back enough!" she seemed genuinely worried.

"It's OK, you were. It didn't hurt, but, you know, it's a little too tight."

"Oh good. Thank you SO much Micheal. You don't know what this means to me!"

You relax a little as she pulls back, but she just seems to be staring at you now, still a little teary.

"OK, so... Um, 'girlfriend'?" You say. "What do you want to do?"
12413.title: Very close friends!

choices: You both awake and plan where you are going to go today.
You waken as Lamp is fondling you in her sleep! What is she doing?
124132.content:
"I want you to show me the best spots for lovers, every romantic spot you know on the whole Earth!" she practically squeals.

"That's a tall order! It's a big planet Lamp, and I've not traveled very far around it. I'll gladly take you to the places round here I know. Er, tonight you mean?"

"Mmmm? Oh no. Tonight we sleep here. You can show me around tomorrow. Deal?"

"Heh, sure Lamp." you say, a little nervously. What does she mean by 'sleep here'? You hope it isn't what you think it means! You barely know her!

"OK, there's a cleaner in there," she says, pointing at another door in the far wall, "so you get ready for bed and I'll do the same."

You stumble up off the bed as she does and head to 'the cleaner' while she heads out the other door... then she stops, turns, and dashes back. She envelopes you in a much lighter hug, her lips meet yours and suddenly you are loosing yourself in the best kiss you've ever had. You can feel her tongue squirming deep into your mouth and automatically you try and do the same, feeling rather inadequate with a merely human tongue! Finally the kiss breaks and a blushing Lamp grins at you, then dashes out back into the corridor.

"Wow!" you mutter, blushing yourself before heading a little giddily to 'the cleaner' again.

It looks just like a bathroom but with no controls for lights, water etc. You find out that waving your hand above the sink gets the water going, and thinking about it changes the water temperature. You have no idea what she is thinking of for bed. Did she mean... she wants to make love? You almost think of taking all your clothes off, like you normally do to go to bed, but end up leaving your boxers on, blushing at that. After washing and using some sort of hole on the wall that seems to clean your teeth remotes via some sort of sonic cleaning, you head back into the room and find Lamp just coming in.

She's dressed in a semi-transparent gown, leaving very little to the imagination! OK, she does look hot! With both of you blushing you climb into the bed, you a little awkwardly. Fluffing the pillows up under your head she draws you near, bare inches from her face.

"Thank you Micheal. No-one's ever been this friendly to me before!" she says, then kisses you again.

It's just as intense as before and when you break it you find yourself wrapped around her, her wrapped around you, and you feel her body pressing tightly to yours, her very soft chest pressing against your own, the warmth seeping into you.

"Sleep well." She murmurs, tracing a line down your cheek with one finger, then closes her eyes.

You blink as she hear her breathing change almost instantly. The two of you are still wrapped around each other in a very amorous embrace, but she's now obviously deep asleep already. You're pretty sure she must have noticed the bulge in your underwear as her crotch is tight against yours! But, apparently she just wants to sleep. This is all so weird you're kind of glad yourself it didn't go any further... kind of. Though now you are incredibly horny! Hard not to be with a beautiful girl smooshed up against you! Somehow you manage to drift to sleep in Lamp's arms, staring at her beautiful face until your eyes close.
124132.title: Planning the next day.

choices: She pulls your underwear down and sleep fucks you!
She starts to swallow you in her sleep!
1241322.content:
A wonderful dream flits from your brain, and from what little you remember a very sexy dream... only to find that reality isn't far behind it!

"Mmmmmm!" a sound thrums against your head and you find Lamp's lips practically against your ear, her body squirming against you, her hands roaming across your back.

13.content:
"Hmpf"

That wasn't the response you'd thought you'd get. It was like she was brushing you off like some common girl off the street. She had an uncaring look on her face now, and she basically walks right past you. You are no longer frozen in fear, but are stunned by the fact that this being had just ignored you.......

You turn around and see her strut off. You can't believe this. An alien was on Earth, and she passes by you like you were nothing......and you were offended.

She stopped at the entrance to the park, and you took this chance to approach her, a bit nervous. "H-hey!"

The pink girl turned to look at you. "What do you want?" Her voice seemed like it belonged to someone your age.

You gulp a bit but continue. "A-are you....an Alien?"

She shrugs. "I guess to you, that would be a yes. So what?"

You couldn't believe what you were hearing. She was answering you like she wasn’t anything out of the ordinary. She catches your expression and smiles. “First time seeing a Majin? Be glad it was me, or this planet my not be existing right now.”

“M-majin? Like Majin Buu, Majin?”

“Yeah. Pft. He’s the popular one alright, even on this planet. But he doesn’t have my natural charm.” She laughs a bit. “So, I guess I should introduce myself. My name is Lamp.”

“I-I’m Michael…..sorry. It’s my first time seeing an alien.”

“Every time I see a primitive species see me as their first alien, it’s kinda funny. Your expression is priceless.” She smiles. “Anyways, my ship crashed here, and I have no idea how to fix it. I’m also guessing your species isn’t advanced enough to fix it. So until I can figure out myself, I guess I’m staying here.”

You look shocked again. She’s staying?!?

“So, Michael, how about you show me around? Might as well see what you got on this rock. And maybe I can meet some more of your species along the way. What are you called?”

“Uh…humans….on Earth.”

“Earth….humans….I’ll remember that.” She gives a wink, and you flinch a bit. “So, how about it? Gonna give me a tour?”

14.content:
"Out of my way, Earthling."

She pushes you aside, and you almost fall. She stomped off, not even looking back. You get a bit frustrated: even from an alien, you weren't going to just stand there without speaking up. "Hey!"

The girl turns back to you. "What is it?"

"That was kind rude, you know." You were really taking either a courageous step or the biggest mistake in your life confronting something you never even knew existed. You quivered a bit, but stand your ground.

"And what if it was?" She smirked a bit, standing with her arms crossed over her chest. "Whatcha gonna do about it? I doubt you can fight a Majin."

You stumble back a bit. "M-Majin?"

"The name’s Lamp. I’m a Majin. I was navigating somewhere when I crashed down on this planet. Heard a bit about Earthlings, mostly about technology and how slow they are, but never really cared for them. Didn't know they were so weak, though."

You restrain yourself out of fear. No wonder she looked familiar. You knew what Majins were capable of….and you didn’t want any of it. “Uh….ok…..I’m sorry.”

She looked at you with a curious expression. “What was that?”

“I-I’m sorry I kinda snapped.”

She just stared at you. “What do you mean? You got angry. It’s natural.”

“But I didn’t know who you were. I should have been a bit more civil. My name is Michael.”

She continued to stare. “What is all this? You’re suddenly being Mr. Goody Two-Shoes?”

You kinda shiver, but straighten yourself. “You’re a visitor. Maybe an extraterrestrial one, but still. I need to show a bit of hospitality, right? I mean, you say you crashed….”

She nodded. “Yeah. From the looks of it, human technology isn’t advanced enough to fix it, either. So I’m just gonna have to stay for a while.”

You nod slowly. “You’re staying here?”

“Yeah. I may need a place to stay, but I’m definitely gonna be staying on Earth until it’s fixed…..may take a while.”

You gulp a bit. Majins, from what you knew, had a tendency to destroy planets. You formulate in your head that if she doesn’t like the planet, a simple flick of her wrist and it’s all gone. You need to think of something……

The Majin's voice was loud and demanding, but even though you knew what she was capable of (roughly), you decided you'd stand your ground. After all, while Lamp was more than capable of killing you, the fact remained that she hadn't yet. And there was no way you were gonna let some random magic demon chick boss you around and make you her slave!

"No."

"I-I'm sorry, did you just say ‘No’?" Lamp's eyes widened. "That wasn't a request. That was an order." Lamp's eyes studied yours for a moment before she tilted her head back and sighed, unbeknownst to you letting a little piece of her recede onto the ground. "Fine." She said quickly. "Maybe after this you'll know not to defy me."

"What?" You asked, confused, a shadow rapidly becoming cast over your immediate view. You turned around quickly, averting your eyes from the Majin as Lamp's bodily offshoot leaped onto you. Your eyes widened as your vision was quickly filled with pink, trying to push against the goo to no avail, as it easily began covering your form.

"Ugh..." Lamp groaned, a sudden realization becoming apparent. "My power's gonna drop like a stone..." She verbalized. "Oh well. It's not gonna be for very long. Just until I think you've learned your lesson."

Lamp continued to watch you struggle in vain, her goo having completely covered your body. With a flick of her wrist, the goo propelled itself back over to Lamp, keeping your body safely inside it.

Immediately upon contact, Lamp's body moulded and contorted, easily liquifying and taking your now unconscious body into her. Lamp moaned, her body slowly reforming, taking on a slightly altered shape due to having absorbed you. Her antenna was now slightly longer, and her bust size was slightly reduced, but the biggest change of course was that she now appeared to be wearing the same clothes that you had on - your school uniform.

Lamp moaned again, her self-awareness increasing as the absorption process finished. Her power had decreased quite a bit since absorbing you, though she was still the strongest thing on the planet by a wide margin. Lamp cracked her neck, looking herself over as she ran her fingers along the school uniform.

Slowly smiling, showing her pearly white teeth, Lamp called upon the memories she’d inherited from you to know the location of your house and quickly took to the sky for a short flight to your house. Lamp landed out the front, going to open the door, but ended up crushing the doorknob with her incredible strength. Lamp sighed, knocking the door down as she walked in.

The rather loud sound drew both your mother and sister to find out what was going on, and they certainly weren’t expecting to find a weird bubblegum-looking creature standing in their doorway!

"Oh my God! Who are you?!" Your mother cried, keeping Hannah close to her.

"Be quiet..." Lamp murmured, her antenna flicking forward and shooting out a ray of pink light, easily engulfing your mother and sister. When the light faded, two bars of dark chocolate were found in their place.

Lamp sighed, leaving them be for the time being as she helped herself to whatever she found in the cupboards, pantry and freezer that piqued her interest.

* * *

Lamp sighed, lying back on your bed, her appetite gone, at least for the moment. She'd spent the last hour practically gorging herself on ice cream, chocolate, soft drinks, anything sweet really. She’d thankfully left both your mother and sister intact, their chocolate bar-selves sitting on a plate on your bedside table. Lamp turned looking over at them, running a hand along her still-slim belly.

After taking a moment to think, Lamp decided to...
153.title: Not-so-Heroic Face-Off

info.brief_description: You are visited by a female Majin who takes a liking to you.
info.description:
I do not own anything related to Dragonball, Dragonball Z, or Dragonball GT or any DB Fanon

You are a 15 year old who is at the brink of insanity because you haven't found love. Then, one day, something comes to your neighborhood: a girl with pink skin and an antennae. Her name is Lamp, a Majin that came to Earth to start a new life. And she seems attracted to you.....

Note: This is NOT a crossover story.

Here is a picture of Lamp: http://epe-tohri.deviantart.com/art/Character-sheet-Lamp-123200065

There are a few guidelines:

1: No scat or hard vore.
2: Lamp is a girl. No genderbending.
3: Lamp has the abilities of Buu, such as the candy (Lollipops are her favorite) beam and absorption, as well as regeneration.
4: Vore is accepted in oral, breast, unbirth, and absorption. Absorption can either be transformation or just insides. (Ex: When Vegeto wasn't fully absorbed, they explored the insides.)
5: If Lamp turns anyone into candy, they have the ability to talk and feel, but not move.
6: Please try to not have the main character die until at least 10 chapters into a branch of the story.
7: Growth and shirnking is allowed, for both the main character and Lamp. Giantess is accepted
8:Lamp has 2 sisters, Ascha and Juk, and whether or not they will visit will be determined later. Other than them, No other DBZ or DB Fanon characters.

This will be changed over time.
